Name: The Shield of Aiur
Description:
A strong flagship of Mothership. Capable to use Mass Recall, Time Warp, Astral Winds. Capable to use Galaxy Swirl to create a Singularity to destroy enemy units or use Planetary Craker to release firepower from orbit. Capable to use Wormhole Transit.

Can attack ground and air units.

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Moving units will not engage enemies.
Root.Name: Move

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Root.Name: Stop

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to stay where they are and attack enemies that are within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.
Root.Name: Hold Position

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to patrol between their current position and the target area. Units will attack enemies and move to engage nearby enemies.
Root.Name: Patrol

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target point, fighting nearby enemies along the way. Targeting a unit with the Attack command orders that it be attacked until it is destroyed.
Root.Name: Attack

Root.Tooltip: Cloaking Field passively cloaks friendly nearby units and structures.**Passive ability**
Root.Name: Cloaking Field

Root.Tooltip: Warp Purification and surronding ally units to target location.
Root.Name: Mass Recall

Root.Tooltip: Warp Spaces from other dimension to target area. Last for 0 seconds. The spaces will disrupt the time within the area, slowing down enemy ground units' movement and attack speed by 75%, and dealing at most 100 damage.
Root.Name: Time Collapse

Root.Tooltip: Warp Spaces from other dimension to target area. Last for 0 seconds. The spaces will disrupt the time within the area, slowing down enemy ground units' movement and attack speed by 75%.
Root.Name: Time Warp

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Scan-moving units will not engage enemies.
Root.Name: Scan Move

Root.Tooltip: Gathering spirits restore 100 shields and 100 health for the Shield of Aiur and surrounding friendly units.
Root.Name: Astral Wind

Root.Tooltip: 将目标区域内敌方单位吸入黑洞中限制他们的一切行动，持续8秒。星河漩涡会同时在目标地点创造一个奇点，8秒后奇点会塌缩从而对其中的单位造成300点伤害。
Root.Name: Galaxy Swirl

Root.Tooltip: Warp Shield of Aiur to planetary target high altitude orbit, unleashes destructive Planetary Cracker to enemy units below within a wide range. After the blow with Planetary Cracker, Shield of Aiur will warp to the ground below. Planetary Cracker lasts for 30 seconds.
Root.Name: Planetary Cracker

Root.Tooltip: Warp Shield of Aiur to target location through Wormhole.
Root.Name: Wormhole Transit

Root.Tooltip: Enable the Shield of Aiur to turn on the defense matrix, and the Shield of Aiur will continuously reduce the energy value during the opening of the matrix. The original missile-type projectiles of enemy units will hit the matrix and be destroyed. Each missile destroyed will consume the Shield of Aiur 2 energy.
Root.Name: Defense Martix

Root.Tooltip: Turn off the defense matrix. The Shield of Aiur no longer intercepts projectiles and consumes energy.
Root.Name: Disable Defense Martix

Weapons.Name: 艾尔之盾内置拦截武器

Behaviors.Tooltip: This unit can detect cloaked or burrowed units within its sight range.
Behaviors.Name: Detector
